bagi mitra korporat suplier 
fasilitas berupa pembayaran tagihan korporat pada saat tanggal jatuh temponya oleh bni dan perpanjangan pembayaran tagihan dari mitra korporat distributor kepada bni 
layanan distributor financing kami sediakan untuk perusahaan yang ingin meningkatkan pertumbuhan bisnis dan mengatur proses cash cycle produksinya dengan talangan pembiayaan tagihan dari bni kepada mitra korporat distributor 
dalam hal ini dapat dilakukan pengaturan pembayaran pada saat jatuh tempo tagihan atau diperpanjang sesuai kebutuhan mitra korporat distributor

bagi mitra korporat distributor

bni memberikan talangan piutang korporat untuk dibayarkan lebih cepat

this sector produces goods and food products through agricultural crops fisheries farms forests and livestock farms 
this sector forms the largest industry in indonesia which in dua ribu delapan contributed seratus tiga puluh tujuh persen to the nations gross domestic product industries that are related to this sector are fertilizers chemicals and rubber atau plastic and synthetic product industries there are tiga belas companies operating in the rubber sector and sembilan companies in the chemical sector as the driving factor of growth in the agricultural sector the fertilizer industry is projected to expand by delapan persen  sepuluh persen per year the products urea and npk fertilizers are also expected to expand by tiga persen  dua belas persen per year in order to meet consumer demands on the connectivity speed of mobile wireless and broadband internet network access which since dua ribu enam has shown growth of dua puluh persen per year for the mobile and internet users and lima puluh empat persen per year for broadband users the government has broken the duopoly of telkom and indosat and has given full rights of service towards other operators furthermore the government has balanced the connection rates amongst operators to encourage competition this situation will increase competition amongst the lima-telecommunication companies and will stimulate foreign investment e gram siemens and lucent have built rnd centers in indonesia in addition investments in infrastructure and network expansion & upgrades are projected to increase this sector consists of the cocoa fruit coconut coffee sugar tobacco and food & packaged beverage alcoholic and non-alcoholic industries there are two major players in this sector mncs that offer goods to consumers who are price conscious especially amongst the working classes and mncs that target upper-middle-class consumers the bottled beverage industry holds a empat puluh persen share of non-alcoholic drinks in addition there is an increase in consumer purchases on a variety of food and beverage products that contribute to the rapid growth of the retailer kretek cigarettes which consist of a blend of tobacco cloves and other ingredients represent sembilan puluh persen of the tobacco industry in indonesia and is protected from foreign competition consisting of the oil gas and geothermal exploration sectors this is an upstream industry that provides raw materials for secondary industries such as refineries the increase of oil consumption in indonesia by lima belas persen has occurred because of the growth in the nationak tm s economy the government has issued policies to support investment such as the abolition of tax on the import of capital goods for oil and gas exploration this has implications to the accelerated discovery of new oil fields and the exploration of alternative energy sources such as coal which enjoys a seribu tiga belas persen growth rate per year hydroelectric geothermal and nuclear power the chemical industry is one of the delapan major individual debtors with a total value of seribu tujuh ratus tiga puluh delapan rupiah trillion and the second largest group debtor with a total value of lima ribu empat ratus lima puluh tiga rupiah trillion therefore bni has implemented a loan growth strategy in the delapan key sectors with the chemical industry being one of them consisting of infrastructure and property constructions contributing factors the electric industry produces electricity intended for households commercial enterprises the manufacturing sector streetlights as well as the social and governmental sectors the government has set several provisions to support the privatization of electricity meaning an end to the state electricity companys pln monopoly and to promote competition in the electric sector 
the situation is as follows the growth rate of electricity consumption exceeds the growth of the number of power plants resulting in a significant amount of the population who do not have access to electricity 
the government will continue to subsidize the poorer segments of the population to accelerate the economic development 
there is a possibility of long-term financing as the government plans to set up a further delapan puluh tiga power plants 
the retail segment trade is concentrated in jakarta but has been aggressively expanding into bandung surabaya medan denpasar and to makassar balikpapan manado and pekanbaru 
current trading partners japan eu usa singapore malaysia and china 
indonesias exports are dominated by agriculture and raw materials while its imports are in the form of industrial goods of these eight dominant sectors the agribusiness sector is the most dominant sector despite its decreasing growth rate however it includes the food & beverage and tobacco industries that accounts for lima puluh persen of the total gdp in addition the wholesale and retail trade sectors are considered as emerging markets with a rapid growth rate increasingly sophisticated banking services such as trade finance remittance treasury and cash management are essential agribusiness also has a stable percentage of non-performing loans npl and the market demand is relatively clear and definite unless there is crop failure the communications sector has retained its customers boasts a high level of demand and a relatively stable income the major players in the mining sector are usually large companies that are financially strong and the government-owned electricity sector always get better treatment from the government 
bni credit card is committed to protecting your privacy and developing technology
that gives you the most powerful and safe online experience 
this statement of privacy
applies to the bni credit card site and governs data collection and usage 
by using the bni credit card site you consent to the data practices described
in this statement 
collection of your personal information bni credit card collects personally identifiable information such as your email
address name home or work address or telephone number 
bni credit card also
collects anonymous demographic information which is not unique to you such as
your zip code age gender preferences interests and favorites 
there is also information about your computer hardware and software that is automatically
collected by bni credit card 
this information can include your ip address 
browser type domain names access times and referring website addresses 
this
information is used by bni credit card for the operation of the service to
maintain quality of the service and to provide general statistics regarding use
of the bni credit card site 
please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information
or personally sensitive data through bni credit card public message boards 
this information may be collected and used by others 
note bni credit card
does not read any of your private online communications 
bni credit card encourages you to review the privacy statements of web sites
you choose to link to from bni credit card so that you can understand how those
web sites collect use and share your information 
bni credit card is not responsible
for the privacy statements or other content on web sites outside of the bni credit card
and bni credit card family of web sites 
use of your personal information bni credit card collects and uses your personal information to operate the bni credit card
web site and deliver the services you have requested 
bni credit card also uses
your personally identifiable information to inform you of other products or services
available from bni credit card and its affiliates 
bni credit card may also
contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services
or of potential new services that may be offered 
bni credit card does not sell rent or lease its customer lists to third parties 
bni credit card may from time to time contact you on behalf of external business
partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you 
in those cases 
your unique personally identifiable information e-mail name address telephone
number is not transferred to the third party 
in addition bni credit card
may share data with trusted partners to help us perform statistical analysis send
you email or postal mail provide customer support or arrange for deliveries 
all
such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to
provide these services to bni credit card and they are required to maintain
the confidentiality of your information 
bni credit card does not use or disclose sensitive personal information such
as race religion or political affiliations without your explicit consent 
bni credit card keeps track of the web sites and pages our customers visit within
bni credit card in order to determine what bni credit card services are
the most popular 
this data is used to deliver customized content and advertising
within bni credit card to customers whose behavior indicates that they are interested
in a particular subject area 
bni credit card web sites will disclose your personal information without notice 
only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is
necessary to a conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process
served on bni credit card or the site bit protect and defend the rights or
property of bni credit card and c act under exigent circumstances to protect
the personal safety of users of bni credit card or the public 
use of cookies the bni credit card web site use cookies to help you personalize your online
experience 
a cookie is a text file that is placed on your hard disk by a web page
server 
cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer 
cookies are uniquely assigned to you and can only be read by a web server in the
domain that issued the cookie to you 
one of the primary purposes of cookies is to provide a convenience feature to save
you time 
the purpose of a cookie is to tell the web server that you have returned
to a specific page 
for example if you personalize bni credit card pages or
register with bni credit card site or services a cookie helps bni credit card
to recall your specific information on subsequent visits 
this simplifies the process
of recording your personal information such as billing addresses shipping addresses 
and so on 
when you return to the same bni credit card web site the information
you previously provided can be retrieved so you can easily use the bni credit card
features that you customized 
you have the ability to accept or decline cookies 
most web browsers automatically
accept cookies but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies
if you prefer 
if you choose to decline cookies you may not be able to fully experience
the interactive features of the bni credit card services or web sites you visit 
security of your personal information bni credit card secures your personal information from unauthorized access 
use or disclosure 
bni credit card secures the personally identifiable information
you provide on computer servers in a controlled secure environment protected from
unauthorized access use or disclosure 
when personal information such as a credit
card number is transmitted to other web sites it is protected through the use
of encryption such as the secure socket layer ssl protocol 
changes to this statement bni credit card will occasionally update this statement of privacy to reflect
company and customer feedback 
bni credit card encourages you to periodically
review this statement to be informed of how bni credit card is protecting your
information 
contact information bni credit card welcomes your comments regarding this statement of privacy 
if you believe that bni credit card has not adhered to this statement please
contact bni credit card at yusuf dot kang et plasmedia dot com

problem

indonesias positive economic growth has created a supportive environment for the business development of national banks in an attempt to strengthen its market positioning especially in the business banking sector bni has conducted a host of business transformations which focus on customer-centric businesses bni business banking implements these customer centric businesses through growth strategies on delapan eight leading sectors including oil gas & mining engineering & construction telecommunication electricity chemical retailers & wholesalers agriculture and food & beverage through these customer centric approaches and the focused strategies on the eight leading sectors bni is poised to deliver superior performance in providing high investment rates for its shareholders it also strives on becoming the bank of choice for the financial needs of its clients across all sectors with the best quality service provided to its customers furthermore bni can achieve its ambition in becoming the market leader in the business banking sector as well as becoming a leading bank in both service and performance lmc satu serves as origination & relationship for corporate customers that focus on serving local corporate companies up to multinational companies in the oil gas & mining electricity telecommunication and construction & engineering industries this is reflected by the steady growth of business deals received from year-to-year and at this present moment the oil gas & mining sectors hold the largest percentage of business compared to other sectors through lmc satu corporate customers receive end-to-end service through the availability of integrated solutions lmc dua serves as origination & relationship for corporate customers that focus on serving customers ranging from local corporate companies up to multinational companies in the agribusiness retailer chemical pharmaceutical food & beverage transportation and logistic industries lmc dua is supported by trained and reliable professionals in the field of marketing along with support from other business units it also serves the customers needs in the form of asset management product liabilities atau funding syndicated loans & corporate finance as well as customer transaction facilities through cash management including financial solutions and trade finance supported by a superior service for its customers 
this is reflected by the steady growth of business deals received from year-to-year 
at this present moment the agribusiness sector holds the largest percentage of business compared to other sectors 
through lmc dua corporate private customers receive end-to-end service by providing total financial solutions 
state-owned enterprises bumn in indonesia remain a cornerstone of the economic growth in the country 
as one of the state owned banks bni has always had an active role as an agent of development in supporting the governments banking needs the availability of synergized strategies between state-owned enterprises launched by the ministry of state enterprises means that bni needs to provide integrated services and strategies to clients through bin that serves as origination & relationship bin is supported by trained and reliable professionals in the field of marketing who strive to serve the customers needs in a professional manner 
to date there are several state-owned enterprises that have been served by bin 
other services provided include total solutions of the customers banking needs namely bilateral and syndicated financing direct loans and atau or non-direct loans fund management through integrated cash management including financial solutions supported by superior services furthermore bin conducts a cross selling strategy in offering products and services related to treasury trade finance and consumer retail products to date bni has conducted a number of deals with governmental departments as well as state owned enterprises namely as the operational bank bo for the distribution of the state budget and the development of the bos fund distribution through bin customers receive end-to-end service by providing integrated solutions in order to improve banking transactions in the business banking sector tbs has declared dua ribu dua belas hingga dua ribu tiga belas the market leadership period aiming to become the bank of choice and striving to provide efficient solutions the best service and to become a strategic partner for its customers with its customer centric focus tbs offers cash management solutions on financial transactions for daily business dealings and appropriate solutions to improve efficiency in its management of financial transactions to make it easy for customers to use its cash management solutions bni offers the bnidirect corporate internet banking facility that provides a range of features including payment management single and mass atau bulk payment collection management liquidity management and information management bnidirects strength in serving corporate customers lies in its service features which have been adapted to the standard cash management needs of multinational companies who have a wealth of experience in terms of cash management transaction services for banks 
besides bnidirect tbs also focuses on supporting supply chain financing services as well as custody and securities services 
the goal of tbs is to ensure that its main customers always receive the best solutions close support and integrated solutions end-to-end solutions 
indonesias economy has grown in many sectors including the small mid-sized and micro businesses umkm sectors as one of the banks targeting these segments bni strives to fulfill its customers needs through various services specifically for the umkm sectors 
cns strives to provide services that prioritize the handling of loan distribution towards customers who operate small or medium sized businesses 
mid -sized business customers with credit needs of between rp 
sepuluh milyar juta ribu up to rp 
seratus lima puluh milyar juta ribu can be served by intermediate loans centers skm while small sized businesses with credit needs of up to rp 
lima belas milyar juta ribu can be served by small loan centers skc and certain branches depending on the size of its business 
through dua puluh intermediate loan centers skm and lima puluh satu small loan centers skc spread across a number of indonesias major cities the cns division provides banking services in the form of working capital credit kmk investment credit ki bank guarantee gigabyte local letter of credit skbdn and letter of credit lc as well as other methods of payment that have been adjusted according to the customers needs 
on top of the aforementioned points bni together with the government also provide small business loans kur and other credit programs either to individuals business groups as well as through a linkage program cooperatives & bpr and pola inti plasma 
considering the intense competition in the banking industry and to respond to constantly evolving customer needs banks need to set new strategies that include market conditions and the monitoring of a balanced portfolio for each sector 
through customer analysis and portofolio management cau the customers needs in the business banking sector are channeled into a value-based industry analysis the business-banking sectors portfolio management review and improvement of systems procedures for business banking loans and customized loans for clients with minimal risk 
the various analysis results are expected to improve the quality of bnis customer-centric service and address the needs of customers it is hoped that through the cau the alignment and integration process between segments in bnis business banking sector can increase its business and customer engagement

bni credit card is committed to protecting your privacy and developing technology
that gives you the most powerful and safe online experience 
this statement of privacy
applies to the bni credit card site and governs data collection and usage 
by using the bni credit card site you consent to the data practices described
in this statement 
collection of your personal information bni credit card collects personally identifiable information such as your email
address name home or work address or telephone number 
bni credit card also
collects anonymous demographic information which is not unique to you such as
your zip code age gender preferences interests and favorites 
there is also information about your computer hardware and software that is automatically
collected by bni credit card 
this information can include your ip address 
browser type domain names access times and referring website addresses 
this
information is used by bni credit card for the operation of the service to
maintain quality of the service and to provide general statistics regarding use
of the bni credit card site 
please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information
or personally sensitive data through bni credit card public message boards 
this information may be collected and used by others 
note bni credit card
does not read any of your private online communications 
bni credit card encourages you to review the privacy statements of web sites
you choose to link to from bni credit card so that you can understand how those
web sites collect use and share your information 
bni credit card is not responsible
for the privacy statements or other content on web sites outside of the bni credit card
and bni credit card family of web sites 
use of your personal information bni credit card collects and uses your personal information to operate the bni credit card
web site and deliver the services you have requested 
bni credit card also uses
your personally identifiable information to inform you of other products or services
available from bni credit card and its affiliates 
bni credit card may also
contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services
or of potential new services that may be offered 
bni credit card does not sell rent or lease its customer lists to third parties 
bni credit card may from time to time contact you on behalf of external business
partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you 
in those cases 
your unique personally identifiable information e-mail name address telephone
number is not transferred to the third party 
in addition bni credit card
may share data with trusted partners to help us perform statistical analysis send
you email or postal mail provide customer support or arrange for deliveries 
all
such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to
provide these services to bni credit card and they are required to maintain
the confidentiality of your information 
bni credit card does not use or disclose sensitive personal information such
as race religion or political affiliations without your explicit consent 
bni credit card keeps track of the web sites and pages our customers visit within
bni credit card in order to determine what bni credit card services are
the most popular 
this data is used to deliver customized content and advertising
within bni credit card to customers whose behavior indicates that they are interested
in a particular subject area 
bni credit card web sites will disclose your personal information without notice 
only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is
necessary to a conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process
served on bni credit card or the site bit protect and defend the rights or
property of bni credit card and c act under exigent circumstances to protect
the personal safety of users of bni credit card or the public 
use of cookies the bni credit card web site use cookies to help you personalize your online
experience 
a cookie is a text file that is placed on your hard disk by a web page
server 
cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer 
cookies are uniquely assigned to you and can only be read by a web server in the
domain that issued the cookie to you 
one of the primary purposes of cookies is to provide a convenience feature to save
you time 
the purpose of a cookie is to tell the web server that you have returned
to a specific page 
for example if you personalize bni credit card pages or
register with bni credit card site or services a cookie helps bni credit card
to recall your specific information on subsequent visits 
this simplifies the process
of recording your personal information such as billing addresses shipping addresses 
and so on 
when you return to the same bni credit card web site the information
you previously provided can be retrieved so you can easily use the bni credit card
features that you customized 
you have the ability to accept or decline cookies 
most web browsers automatically
accept cookies but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies
if you prefer 
if you choose to decline cookies you may not be able to fully experience
the interactive features of the bni credit card services or web sites you visit 
security of your personal information bni credit card secures your personal information from unauthorized access 
use or disclosure 
bni credit card secures the personally identifiable information
you provide on computer servers in a controlled secure environment protected from
unauthorized access use or disclosure 
when personal information such as a credit
card number is transmitted to other web sites it is protected through the use
of encryption such as the secure socket layer ssl protocol 
changes to this statement bni credit card will occasionally update this statement of privacy to reflect
company and customer feedback 
bni credit card encourages you to periodically
review this statement to be informed of how bni credit card is protecting your
information 
contact information bni credit card welcomes your comments regarding this statement of privacy 
if you believe that bni credit card has not adhered to this statement please
contact bni credit card at yusuf dot kang et plasmedia dot com 
we will use commercially reasonable efforts to promptly determine and remedy the
problem

penegakan diagnosis lupus eritematosus sistemik harus dilakukan oleh seorang dokter spesialis rheumatologi dan imunologi 
klasifikasi who lupus nefritis diagnosa inflamasi dari otak cerebral hemisphere brainstem atau cerebellum yang diakibatkan karena infeksi virus yang menimbulkan komplikasi bermakna yang berlangsung paling sedikit selama enam enam minggu yang mencakup defisit syaraf permanen atau menetap dan dikonfirmasi oleh dokter ahli syaraf 
defisit syaraf permanen atau menetap dapat berupa retardasi mental emosi yang labil gangguan penglihatan gangguan pendengaran gangguan berbicara kelemahan atau kelumpuhan 
radang otak yang disebabkan oleh infeksi hiv dikecualikan dari penyakit ini 
kecelakaan yang menyebabkan luka pada kepala sehingga mengakibatkan defisit neurologi permanen yang timbul kurang dari enam enam minggu sejak kecelakaan terjadi sehingga tertanggung tidak dapat melakukan tiga tiga dari lima lima aktifitas hidup sehari-hari selama minimal enam enam bulan 
diagnosa ini harus ditegakkan oleh dokter ahli syaraf dan didukung oleh tehnik magnetic resonance imaging computerized tomography atau tehnik lainnya yang diakui 
kecelakaan harus terjadi secara langsung dari luar tubuh secara kasat mata dan tidak tergantung dari sebab yang lain 
kondisi dibawah ini dikecualikan dari penyakit ini untuk informasi lebih lanjut mengenai kepesertaan program asuransi perisaiplus hubungi bni call di satu lima nol nol nol empat enam atau melalui e-mail bnicall et bni dot co dot id

bni rewards point adalah program loyalty dari bni dimana untuk setiap transaksi kartu kredit bni senilai rp 
dua ribu lima ratus  dua ribu lima ratus rupiah pemegang kartu akan memperoleh satu satu reward point dan berlaku untuk nilai transaksi kelipatannya 
program bni rewards point redemption memberikan penawaran program penukaran yang menarik bagi semua pemegang kartu kredit bni yang aktif menggunakannya 
bni rewards point memiliki masa berlaku dengan jangka waktu tertentu dan akan kadaluarsa atau hangus apabila tidak dilakukan redemption atau penukaran sampai dengan masa berlaku poin berakhir poin telah kadaluarsa 
tanggal poin kadaluarsa dapat dilihat pada lembar penagihan kartu kredit bni 
sejak tahun dua ribu sebelas bni memberlakukan ketentuan perhitungan bni rewards point melalui mekanisme aging point 
masa berlaku poin dihitung satu tahun sejak poin terbentuk di kartu kredit 
namun masih dapat dilakukan redemption atau penukaran untuk masa satu tahun berikutnya 
untuk list merchant partner yang menerima penukaran bni rewards point akses atau kunjungan ke bni executive airport lounge di beberapa kota di seluruh indonesia melalui penukaran bni rewards point untuk pemegang kartu harga per pax menyesuaikan masing masing lounge

apa itu penggesekkan ganda
penggesekan ganda double swipe terjadi ketika pedagang melakukan penggesekan kartu kredit atau debit pada mesin electronic data capture edc dan cash register cashier 
mengapa bi melarang penggesekan ganda
pelarangan penggesekan ganda dilakukan untuk melindungi masyarakat dari pencurian dan penyalahgunaan data dan informasi kartu 
data yang terdapat dalam kartu yang bisa dicuri berupa apa yang harus dilakukan apabila kita menemukan praktik penggesekan ganda
untuk menambah keamanaan transaksi kartu kredit anda gunakan pin dan lakukan perubahan pin secara berkala

bni credit card is committed to protecting your privacy and developing technology
that gives you the most powerful and safe online experience 
this statement of privacy
applies to the bni credit card site and governs data collection and usage 
by using the bni credit card site you consent to the data practices described
in this statement 
collection of your personal information bni credit card collects personally identifiable information such as your email
address name home or work address or telephone number 
bni credit card also
collects anonymous demographic information which is not unique to you such as
your zip code age gender preferences interests and favorites 
there is also information about your computer hardware and software that is automatically
collected by bni credit card 
this information can include your ip address 
browser type domain names access times and referring website addresses 
this
information is used by bni credit card for the operation of the service to
maintain quality of the service and to provide general statistics regarding use
of the bni credit card site 
please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information
or personally sensitive data through bni credit card public message boards 
this information may be collected and used by others 
note bni credit card
does not read any of your private online communications 
bni credit card encourages you to review the privacy statements of web sites
you choose to link to from bni credit card so that you can understand how those
web sites collect use and share your information 
bni credit card is not responsible
for the privacy statements or other content on web sites outside of the bni credit card
and bni credit card family of web sites 
use of your personal information bni credit card collects and uses your personal information to operate the bni credit card
web site and deliver the services you have requested 
bni credit card also uses
your personally identifiable information to inform you of other products or services
available from bni credit card and its affiliates 
bni credit card may also
contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services
or of potential new services that may be offered 
bni credit card does not sell rent or lease its customer lists to third parties 
bni credit card may from time to time contact you on behalf of external business
partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you 
in those cases 
your unique personally identifiable information e-mail name address telephone
number is not transferred to the third party 
in addition bni credit card
may share data with trusted partners to help us perform statistical analysis send
you email or postal mail provide customer support or arrange for deliveries 
all
such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to
provide these services to bni credit card and they are required to maintain
the confidentiality of your information 
bni credit card does not use or disclose sensitive personal information such
as race religion or political affiliations without your explicit consent 
bni credit card keeps track of the web sites and pages our customers visit within
bni credit card in order to determine what bni credit card services are
the most popular 
this data is used to deliver customized content and advertising
within bni credit card to customers whose behavior indicates that they are interested
in a particular subject area 
bni credit card web sites will disclose your personal information without notice 
only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is
necessary to a conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process
served on bni credit card or the site bit protect and defend the rights or
property of bni credit card and c act under exigent circumstances to protect
the personal safety of users of bni credit card or the public 
use of cookies the bni credit card web site use cookies to help you personalize your online
experience 
a cookie is a text file that is placed on your hard disk by a web page
server 
cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer 
cookies are uniquely assigned to you and can only be read by a web server in the
domain that issued the cookie to you 
one of the primary purposes of cookies is to provide a convenience feature to save
you time 
the purpose of a cookie is to tell the web server that you have returned
to a specific page 
for example if you personalize bni credit card pages or
register with bni credit card site or services a cookie helps bni credit card
to recall your specific information on subsequent visits 
this simplifies the process
of recording your personal information such as billing addresses shipping addresses 
and so on 
when you return to the same bni credit card web site the information
you previously provided can be retrieved so you can easily use the bni credit card
features that you customized 
you have the ability to accept or decline cookies 
most web browsers automatically
accept cookies but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies
if you prefer 
if you choose to decline cookies you may not be able to fully experience
the interactive features of the bni credit card services or web sites you visit 
security of your personal information bni credit card secures your personal information from unauthorized access 
use or disclosure 
bni credit card secures the personally identifiable information
you provide on computer servers in a controlled secure environment protected from
unauthorized access use or disclosure 
when personal information such as a credit
card number is transmitted to other web sites it is protected through the use
of encryption such as the secure socket layer ssl protocol 
changes to this statement bni credit card will occasionally update this statement of privacy to reflect
company and customer feedback 
bni credit card encourages you to periodically
review this statement to be informed of how bni credit card is protecting your
information 
contact information bni credit card welcomes your comments regarding this statement of privacy 
if you believe that bni credit card has not adhered to this statement please
contact bni credit card at yusuf dot kang et plasmedia dot com 
we will use commercially reasonable efforts to promptly determine and remedy the
problem

nilai cashback yang anda peroleh dapat dilihat pada lembar penagihan

kartu kredit bni affinity adalah kartu kredit yang dikeluarkan oleh bni bekerja sama dengan organisasi atau institusi non profit 
nama dan logo organisasi atau institusi akan dicetak pada kartu sebagai simbol kebanggaan dan prestige dari suatu organisasi atau institusi 
sampai dengan saat ini bni telah bekerjasama dengan dua puluh delapan universitas tujuh ikatan alumni dan enam belas organisasi di seluruh indonesia 
kartu kredit bni affinity ini dapat dipergunakan sebagai kartu tanda pengenal suatu organisasi alumni atau perkumpulan 
ketentuan mengenai kartu kredit bni affinity ini akan mengacu kepada kesepakatan bersama antara bni dan organisasi atau institusi yang bersangkutan 
kartu kredit bni affinity ini juga dapat berlaku secara internasional karena tetap menggunakan jaringan visa internasional sebagai jaringan kartunya

dengan memiliki kartu kredit bni-ikanas stan secara tidak langsung anda telah berkontribusi dalam mengembangkan setiap kegiatan yang diinisiasi oleh ikanas stan melalui setiap transaksi yang anda lakukan dengan kartu kredit bni-ikanas stan

mengiringi kesuksesan anda batas kredit yang tinggi 
kartu bni visa signature memberikan kebebasan dalam bertransaksi di seluruh dunia di jutaan merchant atau atm dalam jaringan visa atau plus 
baik untuk kebutuhan anda pribadi bisnis maupun keluarga tercinta 
sebagai pribadi yang istimewa kami memahami kesibukan anda 
untuk itu kami khusus menyediakan tenaga profesional yang handal dan ramah selama dua puluh empat jam sehari sepanjang tahun yang siap membantu anda kapanpun anda butuhkan

khusus untuk permohonan pengajuan kartu kredit bni visa infinite 
menjaga keamanan kartu kredit adalah tanggung jawab anda sebagai pemegang kartu dan bank penerbit kartu 
sebagai salah satu upaya menjaga keamanan kartu kredit anda bni akan memberikan edukasi sebanyak mungkin kepada para pemegang kartu 
anda sebagai pemegang kartu dapat ikut berkontribusi untuk menjaga keamanan kartu kredit anda 
berikut ini adalah lima tips yang bisa dilakukan agar terhindar dari penipuan sebagai upaya menjaga keamanan kartu kredit anda petugas bni tidak akan mendatangi anda untuk mengambil kartu kredit dan atau mengganti kartu anda dengan alasan apapun 
jika anda ingin meminta kenaikan limit kartu kredit silakan menghubungi bni call satu lima nol nol nol empat enam 
jika penggunaan dan pembayaran kartu kredit anda bagus ada kemungkinan bni akan menghubungi anda untuk menawarkan kenaikan limit kartu kredit tetapi tidak dengan mendatangi dan mengambil kartu kredit anda 
pengguntingan kartu hendaknya dilakukan sampai bagian chip dan magnetic strip kartu rusak kedua-duanya 
karena jika tidak chip dan magnetic stripe kartu kredit anda masih bisa digunakan bertransaksi oleh pihak yang tidak bertanggung jawab

bni memberikan layanan solusi transaksional terintegrasi yang unggul melalui program supply chain financing scf dengan menggunakan platform bni fscm bni financial supply chain management untuk membantu korporat mengoptimalkan modal kerja dan pengaturan cashlow dalam bekerja sama dengan partner bisnis mitra korporat atau supplier atau distributor serta memberikan solusi bisnis dalam suatu mata rantai dari hulu ke hilir yang disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan nasabah korporat 
program supply chain financing dengan menggunakan platform bni fscm berbasis web ini dapat diakses melalui https atau slash bnifscm dot bni dot co dot id atau 
keuntungan penggunaan bni fscm antara lain akan diperoleh transparansi pemantauan document flow dan money flow dari ketiga pihak bni korporat dan mitra korporat nya informasi real time pencairan dan implementasi lebih mudah serta flexible memudahkan rekonsiliasi dokumen tagihan invoice paperless dan aman web dilengkapi dengan secure https 
layanan bni fscm senantiasa membantu kebutuhan bisnis nasabah dengan solusi yang kami tawarkan yaitu fasilitas berupa pengambilalihan tagihan kepada korporat sebelum tanggal jatuh tempo untuk dibayarkan kepada mitra korporat supplier dengan waktu lebih cepat 
layanan supplier financing kami sediakan untuk perusahaan yang ingin meningkatkan pertumbuhan bisnis dan mempercepat proses cash cycle produksinya dengan cara mengalihkan kepada bank atau bank membiayai lebih dulu tagihan mitra korporat supplier ke korporat 
sasaran suplier financing ditujukan untuk mitra korporat supplier dengan fasilitas dapat diberikan kepada mitra korporat maupun melalui korporat 
manfaat supplier financing bagi korporat
bagi mitra korporat suplier 
fasilitas berupa pembayaran tagihan korporat pada saat tanggal jatuh temponya oleh bni dan perpanjangan pembayaran tagihan dari mitra korporat distributor kepada bni 
layanan distributor financing kami sediakan untuk perusahaan yang ingin meningkatkan pertumbuhan bisnis dan mengatur proses cash cycle produksinya dengan talangan pembiayaan tagihan dari bni kepada mitra korporat distributor 
dalam hal ini dapat dilakukan pengaturan pembayaran pada saat jatuh tempo tagihan atau diperpanjang sesuai kebutuhan mitra korporat distributor 
sasaran distributor financing ditujukan untuk mitra korporat distributor dengan fasilitas diberikan kepada mitra korporat distributor 
manfaat distributor financing bagi korporat
bagi mitra korporat distributor 
fasilitas berupa pengambilalihan tagihan dari korporat kepada mitra korporat distributor untuk dibayarkan sebelum tanggal jatuh tempo tagihan 
layanan receivable financing kami sediakan untuk korporat yang ingin meningkatkan pertumbuhan bisnis dan mempercepat proses cash cycle produksinya dengan talangan pembiayaan tagihan dari bni kepada korporat guna membiayai collection piutangnya 
bni memberikan talangan piutang korporat untuk dibayarkan lebih cepat 
sasaran receivable financing ditujukan untuk korporat secara langsung dengan fasilitas diberikan kepada korporat

this sector produces goods and food products through agricultural crops fisheries farms forests and livestock farms 
this sector forms the largest industry in indonesia which in dua ribu delapan contributed seratus tiga puluh tujuh persen to the nations gross domestic product industries that are related to this sector are fertilizers chemicals and rubber atau plastic and synthetic product industries there are tiga belas companies operating in the rubber sector and sembilan companies in the chemical sector as the driving factor of growth in the agricultural sector the fertilizer industry is projected to expand by delapan persen  sepuluh persen per year the products urea and npk fertilizers are also expected to expand by tiga persen  dua belas persen per year in order to meet consumer demands on the connectivity speed of mobile wireless and broadband internet network access which since dua ribu enam has shown growth of dua puluh persen per year for the mobile and internet users and lima puluh empat persen per year for broadband users the government has broken the duopoly of telkom and indosat and has given full rights of service towards other operators furthermore the government has balanced the connection rates amongst operators to encourage competition this situation will increase competition amongst the lima-telecommunication companies and will stimulate foreign investment e gram siemens and lucent have built rnd centers in indonesia in addition investments in infrastructure and network expansion & upgrades are projected to increase this sector consists of the cocoa fruit coconut coffee sugar tobacco and food & packaged beverage alcoholic and non-alcoholic industries there are two major players in this sector mncs that offer goods to consumers who are price conscious especially amongst the working classes and mncs that target upper-middle-class consumers the bottled beverage industry holds a empat puluh persen share of non-alcoholic drinks in addition there is an increase in consumer purchases on a variety of food and beverage products that contribute to the rapid growth of the retailer kretek cigarettes which consist of a blend of tobacco cloves and other ingredients represent sembilan puluh persen of the tobacco industry in indonesia and is protected from foreign competition consisting of the oil gas and geothermal exploration sectors this is an upstream industry that provides raw materials for secondary industries such as refineries the increase of oil consumption in indonesia by lima belas persen has occurred because of the growth in the nationak tm s economy the government has issued policies to support investment such as the abolition of tax on the import of capital goods for oil and gas exploration this has implications to the accelerated discovery of new oil fields and the exploration of alternative energy sources such as coal which enjoys a seribu tiga belas persen growth rate per year hydroelectric geothermal and nuclear power the chemical industry is one of the delapan major individual debtors with a total value of seribu tujuh ratus tiga puluh delapan rupiah trillion and the second largest group debtor with a total value of lima ribu empat ratus lima puluh tiga rupiah trillion therefore bni has implemented a loan growth strategy in the delapan key sectors with the chemical industry being one of them consisting of infrastructure and property constructions contributing factors the electric industry produces electricity intended for households commercial enterprises the manufacturing sector streetlights as well as the social and governmental sectors the government has set several provisions to support the privatization of electricity meaning an end to the state electricity companys pln monopoly and to promote competition in the electric sector 
the situation is as follows the growth rate of electricity consumption exceeds the growth of the number of power plants resulting in a significant amount of the population who do not have access to electricity 
the government will continue to subsidize the poorer segments of the population to accelerate the economic development 
there is a possibility of long-term financing as the government plans to set up a further delapan puluh tiga power plants 
the retail segment trade is concentrated in jakarta but has been aggressively expanding into bandung surabaya medan denpasar and to makassar balikpapan manado and pekanbaru 
current trading partners japan eu usa singapore malaysia and china 
indonesias exports are dominated by agriculture and raw materials while its imports are in the form of industrial goods of these eight dominant sectors the agribusiness sector is the most dominant sector despite its decreasing growth rate however it includes the food & beverage and tobacco industries that accounts for lima puluh persen of the total gdp in addition the wholesale and retail trade sectors are considered as emerging markets with a rapid growth rate increasingly sophisticated banking services such as trade finance remittance treasury and cash management are essential agribusiness also has a stable percentage of non-performing loans npl and the market demand is relatively clear and definite unless there is crop failure the communications sector has retained its customers boasts a high level of demand and a relatively stable income the major players in the mining sector are usually large companies that are financially strong and the government-owned electricity sector always get better treatment from the government

letter of credit l atau c is a guarantee of payment atau promise of payment from an issuing bank to beneficiary if the documents that have been submitted by the beneficiary are in accordance with the requirements of l atau c ucp enam ratus and international banking practice standards complying presentation 
documentary collection is a payment system by which seller sends goods to buyer and makes billing payment using document through bank services 
generally there are dua two types of documentary collection

bni menyediakan layanan transaksi valuta asing seperti fx tod tom spot serta banknotes

learn more
fx forward merupakan transaksi penjualan atau pembelian suatu mata uang terhadap mata uang lainnya yang penyerahan dananya dilakukan lebih dari dua dua hari kerja sejak tanggal transaksi 
par forward merupakan serangkaian transaksi forward berupa kontrak pembelian atau penjualan kesepakatan untuk mempertukarkan seri atau rangkaian arus kas di masa yang akan datang dari mata uang satu ke mata uang yang lain dengan menggunakan kurs yang sama 
dndf adalah transaksi derivatif valuta asing terhadap rupiah yang standar plain vanilla berupa transaksi forward dengan mekanisme fixing yang dilakukan di pasar domestik 
fx swap adalah transaksi pertukaran suatu jumlah tetap dari suatu mata uang dengan mata uang lainnya pada kurs yang disepakati dan persetujuan simultan untuk melakukan penukaran kembali jumlah yang sama dari mata uang pertama terhadap mata uang kedua pada suatu tanggal di kemudian hari 
ccs merupakan kesepakatan antara dua pihak untuk menukarkan sejumlah pokok dan pembayaran interest dalam mata uang yang berbeda 
penukaran pokok menggunakan kurs pada saat dimulainya transaksi 
irs merupakan kesepakatan antara dua pihak untuk melakukan pertukaran seri atau rangkaian pembayaran interest fixed to float float to fixed atau float to float dalam mata uang yang sama 
fx option adalah perjanjian untuk memberikan hak untuk membeli call option atau menjual put option sejumlah nominal mata uang tertentu untuk masa yang akan datang pada harga yang telah ditetapkan sebelumnya 
cso merupakan gabungan dari transaksi beli call option dan jual call option yang dilakukan secara simultan dalam satu kontrak transaksi dengan strike price yang berbeda dan nominal yang sama 
series of cso suatu kontrak atas serangkaian transaksi cso untuk suatu periode atau jangka waktu tertentu dengan strike price yang sama 
bni digihedge merupakan suatu sistem untuk mendiagnosa kebutuhan lindung nilai nasabah sehingga dapat memberikan solusi transaksi lindung nilai yang tepat untuk memitigasi risiko yang terdeteksi 
bni digihedge memberikan informasi solusi lindung nilai yang sesuai untuk kebutuhan anda 
visit our bni digihedge website 
obligasi merupakan surat hutang yang dapat diperjualbelikan diterbitkan oleh pemerintah ataupun oleh perusahaan 
nasabah dapat melakukan transaksi jual beli obligasi yang diterbitkan oleh emiten indonesia antara lain depo swap adalah produk investasi dalam valuta asing yang merupakan gabungan antara produk fx swap dan deposito atau simpanan 
ml-dci adalah structured product yang merupakan gabungan antara produk simpanan valuta asing dan fx option 
simpanan valuta asing yang dimiliki nasabah akan dihubungkan dengan pergerakan nilai tukar valuta asing tersebut dengan valuta asing lainnya yang telah ditentukan 
pergerakan kedua nilai tukar valuta asing tersebut yang akan menentukan denominasi valuta asing yang diterima nasabah saat jatuh tempo serta potensi keuntungan atau kerugian dari yang akan diterima nasabah 
oleh karena itu ml-dci tidak menjamin pengembalian pokok tetap dalam mata uang valuta asing investasi awal pada saat jatuh tempo 
mma adalah produk simpanan dana nasabah dalam mata uang rupiah atau usd dengan jangka waktu minimal satu hari overnight dan maksimal satu tahun 
doc adalah produk simpanan dalam mata uang rupiah atau usd dengan jangka waktu minimal tiga hari dan maksimal tiga puluh hari 
repo adalah kontrak penjualan surat berharga disertai dengan pembelian kembali surat berharga setelah jangka waktu tertentu pada harga yang telah ditetapkan 
reverse repo adalah kontrak pembelian surat berharga disertai dengan penjualan kembali surat berharga setelah jangka waktu tertentu pada harga yang telah ditetapkan 
nasabah adalah pihak yang melakukan penjualan obligasi dan menerima sejumlah dana sesuai yang diperjanjikan kemudian setelah jangka waktu tertentu wajib melakukan pembelian kembali obligasi yang telah dijual pada harga yang telah disepakati 
nikmati kemudahan dan kenyamanan dalam memenuhi kebutuhan transaksi treasury anda 
transaksi today tom dan spot merupakan transaksi bni dengan nasabah untuk pembelian atau penjualan valuta asing sesuai dengan kebutuhan nasabah 
fx tod adalah transaksi pembelian atau penjualan valuta asing untuk penyerahan dana pada hari yang sama fx tom untuk penyerahan dana setelah satu hari kerja dan fx spot untuk penyerahan dana setelah dua hari kerja 
banknotes adalah transaksi pembelian atau penjualan mata uang asing terhadap mata uang rupiah dalam berbagai kondisi fisik banknotes mint medium dan stamp 
transaksi today tom dan spot merupakan transaksi bni dengan nasabah untuk pembelian atau penjualan valuta asing sesuai dengan kebutuhan nasabah 
fx tod adalah transaksi pembelian atau penjualan valuta asing untuk penyerahan dana pada hari yang sama fx tom untuk penyerahan dana setelah satu hari kerja dan fx spot untuk penyerahan dana setelah dua hari kerja 
banknotes adalah transaksi pembelian atau penjualan mata uang asing terhadap mata uang rupiah dalam berbagai kondisi fisik banknotes mint medium dan stamp 
p t bank negara indonesia persero tbk hereinafter bni or the bank or the company was originally established in indonesia as a central bank under the name of bank negara indonesia based on government regulation in lieu of law no dua of seribu sembilan ratus empat puluh enam dated july lima seribu sembilan ratus empat puluh enam 
subsequently pursuant to law no tujuh belas in seribu sembilan ratus enam puluh delapan bni became bank negara indonesia seribu sembilan ratus empat puluh enam with the status of a state-owned commercial bank 
additionally bnis role as a bank was mandated to improve the peoples economy and participate in national development as confirmed by law no tujuh belas of seribu sembilan ratus enam puluh delapan regarding bank negara indonesia seribu sembilan ratus empat puluh enam 
based on government regulation no sembilan belas seribu sembilan ratus sembilan puluh dua april dua puluh sembilan seribu sembilan ratus sembilan puluh dua bni changed its legal status to a limited liability company persero 
the change of legal status to limited liability company was made in deed no seratus tiga puluh satu dated july tiga puluh satu seribu sembilan ratus sembilan puluh dua before muhani salim sh and was published in the state gazette of the republic of indonesia no tujuh puluh tiga dated september sebelas seribu sembilan ratus sembilan puluh dua supplement no satua 
bni as a state owned enterprise was the first to became a public company after listing its shares on the jakarta stock exchange and the surabaya stock exchange in seribu sembilan ratus sembilan puluh enam 
to strengthen its financial structure and competitiveness in the national banking industry bni conducted a number of corporate actions including being recapitalized by the government in seribu sembilan ratus sembilan puluh sembilan government share divestment in dua ribu tujuh and a limited public offering in dua ribu sepuluh 
to fulfill the provisions of law no empat puluh of dua ribu tujuh dated august enam belas dua ribu tujuh on limited liability companies bnis articles of association were amended the amendments were stated in deed no empat puluh enam dated june tiga belas dua ribu delapan made before fathiah helmi sh notary in jakarta based on an extraordinary general meeting shareholders decision dated may dua puluh delapan dua ribu delapan which was approved by the minister of justice and human rights of the republic of indonesia by decree no ahuah nol satu nol dua hingga lima nol enam nol sembilan dated august dua belas dua ribu delapan and was published in the state gazette of the republic of indonesia no seratus tiga dated december dua puluh tiga dua ribu delapan supplement no dua sembilan nol satu lima bnis articles of association latest changes related to a realignment of the articles of association in accordance with deed no tiga puluh lima dated march tujuh belas dua ribu lima belas made before notary fathiah helmi sh which was approved by the minister of justice and human rights of the republic of indonesia by decree no ahu-ah

bank guarantee under counter guarantee bank guarantee under counter guarantee is an international banking guarantee instrument issued on the basis of requests and counter guarantees received from correspondent bank 
is a facility for adding atau confirming lc atau skbdn issued by correspondent banks that have been provided with commercial line 
is a purchase of transaction bills based on bankers acceptance byte atau a owned by a correspondent bank or bni in connection with lc or skbdn with discount charges without recourse is a sale atau purchase transaction of assets or claims between the bank and domestic or foreign correspondent banks that meet the specified acceptance criteria is a financing facility for domestic and foreign correspondent banks that meet the acceptance criteria based on lc atau skbdn usance payable at sight upas lc atau skbdn and usance payable at usance upau lc atau skbdn transactions bni can act as a reimbursing bank where an issuing bank as a correspondent appoints bni to make payment reimburse of the realization of lc is a financing facility for domestic and foreign correspondent banks that meet the acceptance criteria based on lc atau skbdn transactions or invoice documents a checking account opening service in various currencies on behalf of bank and non-bank financial institutions domestic and international correspondents at bni 
becoming a financial institution that excels in service and performance on an ongoing basis
to accelerate the achievement of the vision bni revitalized by conducting a review of bank bni code of conduct 
in the line with the call name bank bni became bni subsequently altered to code of conduct of bni or abbreviated to coc bni 
the intentions and objectives of the revitalization of the code of bni include firstly to improve the ethics guidelines for all bni people in performing business activities and to promote understanding and awareness of bni people in applying gcg principles 
secondly as criteria of assessing whether an individual obeys or disobeys company rules 
thirdly identify standards and ethics in corporate to match with corporate vision and mission 
coc implementation is expected to create a encouraging working atmosphere for bni people and also to establish a solid teamwork 
on this fortunate opportunity satu expect the entire bni people wherever he atau she exists to be guided and carry out coc sincerely and consistently especially in performing daily task so our beloved bank vision and mission to be materialized

as a corporate bni has reaffirmed its commitment towards the continuous implementation of good corporate governance to the fullest 
it is explicitly stated in the fifth mission of bni namely to become the benchmark of good corporate governance practice 
for bni the implementation of good corporate governance hereinafter abbreviated as gcg has become a necessity instead of a mandatory 
bni realizes only through the implementation of gcg will the bank sustain its continuing existence as business entity in the midst of high competition in banking business and the ongoing global economic crisis 
having a long history as a financial institution bni understand that institutions that can survive the change of times are those who develops maintains and implements a commitment towards the practice of gcg 
bni ceaselessly deepens the implementation of gcg 
such efforts have provided bni with positive guidance in the face of competition improving financial and non-financial performance and further enhance the confidence of stakeholders 
gcg principles were intensified since dua ribu lima when bni established gcg monitoring unit pursuant to board of directors directive no kp atau seratus tujuh puluh empat atau dir atau r dated dua puluh enam april dua ribu lima the unit has evolved along with the development of bni and eventually become the gcg and secretariat group under vp gcg & office of the board pursuant to board of directors directive no kp atau dua ratus tujuh puluh satu atau dir atau r dated november dua puluh empat dua ribu sepuluh concerning organizational change of corporate communications and secretariat division 
the successful implementation of gcg in bni is contributed to all bni employees board of commissioners board of directors and employees for their commitment to implement the principles of gcg 
to internalize the commitment of gcg implementation at the beginning of each year all bni employees always reaffirm the letter of statement of the commitment to implement gcg which contains the declaration of all bni personnel to in addition to at the beginning of each year affirmation to that commitment is also carried out during the inauguration of new officers while taking oath of office in front of religious leaders according to their religions 
the affirmation to the commitment of gcg implementation during the oath taking covers the following as one tangible results from the implementation of gcg in dua ribu sebelas bni won a number of awards from national and international institutions among others are the best of the best company bumn dua ribu sebelas the most admired asean enterprise economics challenges award dua ribu sebelas the best right of shareholders from indonesian institute for corporate directorship iicd and the most trusted company from the indonesian institute for corporate governance iicg

bni sharing program is a community empowerment program designed to improve quality of life 
the program was created in order to support and implement ministry of state owned enterprises bumn regulations as part of the partnership program and community development program 
community development program provides goods and funding for the community to channel and support
nature conservation aid by bni is also known as bni go green program 
loan assistance amount in the partnership program will depend on the number of approved applicants 
presently the world is haunted by possible climate change consequences including environment damages caused by human activity 
bni took proactive steps to help rehabilitate the environment manifested in bni go green 
bni go green program embodies bnis mission to increase awareness and responsibility for the environment and society bnis concern for the environment is motivated by the need for environmental preservation to ensure human survival and business continuity 
to actualize this spirit bni promotes four compasses of sustainability in support of corporate sustainability such as nature society wellbeing and economy 
the four compasses are internalized within business and support units that serve as a reference to design environmentally friendly banking products and services 
internally bni promotes improvement of employee knowledge capacity from employee gree attitude energy saving actions to training on accounting for environmental and social risks in analyzing loan advisability 
bni also provides retail products and services that support green living such as kpr hijau bni-wwf credit cards orangutan adoption and tree-planting features as well as paperless banking servicese-billing formless transfer
externally bni consistently implements environmental preservation programs for forestry and non-forestry categories including energy renewal programs through csr and commercial credit cooperation 
bni also funds its clients environmentally conscious projects such as geothermal biomass biogas hydro and waste management in addition to establishing a perennial nursery that aims to produce one million plants in sentul bogor as well as forest and park rehabilitation in several indonesian cities 
corporate sustainability practices create added value for bni positions and corporate identity 
through bnis corporate sustainability values bni pursues long-term sustainable values for stakeholders while still focusing on nature and social continuity bni has published sustainability reports since dua ribu sembilan to describe bni efforts in implementing sustainability principles 
corporate sustainability practices create added value for bni positions and corporate identity 
through bnis corporate sustainability values bni pursues long-term sustainable values for stakeholders while still focusing on nature and social continuity bni has published sustainability reports since dua ribu sembilan to describe bni efforts in implementing sustainability principles

kampoeng bni is bni partnership and community development seminal program establish to address issues such as stimulating economic welfare poverty alleviation and environmental rehabilitation 
conceptually kampoeng bni is aligned with community development principles as it promotes feature and signature products specific to each region 
kampoeng bni program is channeled through distribution of soft loans implemented using a cluster system all across indonesia 
additionally bni provides community development support to sustain community empowerment in kampoeng bni through provision of training assistance infrastructure and product promotion of partners in training 
the goal is to develop entrepreneurial potentials and elevate public welfare in indonesia especially in rural areas 
there are presently dua puluh satu kampoeng bni all across indonesia that are divided into three main sectors creative industry food sustainability and maritime 
kampoeng bni food sustainability sector areas include lumajang and pujon kampoeng bni creative industry sector areas include kampoeng bni batik tulis lasem kampoeng bni tenun sumsel kampoeng bni tenun pandai sikek and kampoeng bni wisata borobudur magelang 
kampoeng bni fisheries sector areas include kampoeng bni muara angke and kampoeng bni nelayan brondong lamongan

indonesias positive economic growth has created a supportive environment for the business development of national banks in an attempt to strengthen its market positioning especially in the business banking sector bni has conducted a host of business transformations which focus on customer-centric businesses bni business banking implements these customer centric businesses through growth strategies on delapan eight leading sectors including oil gas & mining engineering & construction telecommunication electricity chemical retailers & wholesalers agriculture and food & beverage through these customer centric approaches and the focused strategies on the eight leading sectors bni is poised to deliver superior performance in providing high investment rates for its shareholders it also strives on becoming the bank of choice for the financial needs of its clients across all sectors with the best quality service provided to its customers furthermore bni can achieve its ambition in becoming the market leader in the business banking sector as well as becoming a leading bank in both service and performance lmc satu serves as origination & relationship for corporate customers that state-owned enterprises bumn in indonesia remain a cornerstone of the economic growth in the country 
as one of the state owned banks bni has always had an active role as an agent of development in supporting the governments banking needs the availability of synergized strategies between state-owned enterprises launched by the ministry of state enterprises means that bni needs to provide integrated services and strategies to clients through bin that serves as origination & relationship bin is supported by trained and reliable professionals in the field of marketing who strive to serve the customers needs in a professional manner 
to date there are several state-owned enterprises that have been served by bin 
other services provided include total solutions of the customers banking needs namely bilateral and syndicated financing direct loans and atau or non-direct loans fund management through integrated cash management including financial solutions supported by superior services furthermore bin conducts a cross selling strategy in offering products and services related to treasury trade finance and consumer retail products to date bni has conducted a number of deals with governmental departments as well as state owned enterprises namely as the operational bank bo for the distribution of the state budget and the development of the bos fund distribution through bin customers receive end-to-end service by providing integrated solutions in order to improve banking transactions in the business banking sector tbs has declared dua ribu dua belas hingga dua ribu tiga belas the market leadership period aiming to become the bank of choice and striving to provide efficient solutions the best service and to become a strategic partner for its customers with its customer centric focus tbs offers cash management solutions on financial transactions for daily business dealings and appropriate solutions to improve efficiency in its management of financial transactions to make it easy for customers to use its cash management solutions bni offers the bnidirect corporate internet banking facility that provides a range of features including payment management single and mass atau bulk payment collection management liquidity management and information management bnidirects strength in serving corporate customers lies in its service features which have been adapted to the standard cash management needs of multinational companies who have a wealth of experience in terms of cash management transaction services for banks 
besides bnidirect tbs also focuses on supporting supply chain financing services as well as custody and securities services 
the goal of tbs is to ensure that its main customers always receive the best solutions close support and integrated solutions end-to-end solutions 
indonesias economy has grown in many sectors including the small mid-sized and micro businesses umkm sectors as one of the banks targeting these segments bni strives to fulfill its customers needs through various services specifically for the umkm sectors 
cns strives to provide services that prioritize the handling of loan distribution towards customers who operate small or medium sized businesses 
mid -sized business customers with credit needs of between rp 
sepuluh milyar juta ribu up to rp 
seratus lima puluh milyar juta ribu can be served by intermediate loans centers skm while small sized businesses with credit needs of up to rp 
lima belas milyar juta ribu can be served by small loan centers skc and certain branches depending on the size of its business 
through dua puluh intermediate loan centers skm and lima puluh satu small loan centers skc spread across a number of indonesias major cities the cns division provides banking services in the form of working capital credit kmk investment credit ki bank guarantee gigabyte local letter of credit skbdn and letter of credit lc as well as other methods of payment that have been adjusted according to the customers needs 
on top of the aforementioned points bni together with the government also provide small business loans kur and other credit programs either to individuals business groups as well as through a linkage program cooperatives & bpr and pola inti plasma 
considering the intense competition in the banking industry and to respond to constantly evolving customer needs banks need to set new strategies that include market conditions and the monitoring of a balanced portfolio for each sector 
through customer analysis and portofolio management cau the customers needs in the business banking sector are channeled into a value-based industry analysis the business-banking sectors portfolio management review and improvement of systems procedures for business banking loans and customized loans for clients with minimal risk 
the various analysis results are expected to improve the quality of bnis customer-centric service and address the needs of customers it is hoped that through the cau the alignment and integration process between segments in bnis business banking sector can increase its business and customer engagement

bni is committed to protecting your privacy and developing technology
that gives you the most powerful and safe online experience 
this statement of privacy
applies to the bni site and governs data collection and usage 
by using the bni site you consent to the data practices described
in this statement 
collection of your personal information bni collects personally identifiable information such as your email
address name home or work address or telephone number 
bni also
collects anonymous demographic information which is not unique to you such as
your zip code age gender preferences interests and favorites 
there is also information about your computer hardware and software that is automatically
collected by bni 
this information can include your ip address 
browser type domain names access times and referring website addresses 
this
information is used by bni for the operation of the service to
maintain quality of the service and to provide general statistics regarding use
of the bni site 
please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information
or personally sensitive data through bni public message boards 
this information may be collected and used by others 
note bni
does not read any of your private online communications 
bni encourages you to review the privacy statements of web sites
you choose to link to from bni so that you can understand how those
web sites collect use and share your information 
bni is not responsible
for the privacy statements or other content on web sites outside of the bni
and bni family of web sites 
use of your personal information bni collects and uses your personal information to operate the bni
web site and deliver the services you have requested 
bni also uses
your personally identifiable information to inform you of other products or services
available from bni and its affiliates 
bni may also
contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services
or of potential new services that may be offered 
bni does not sell rent or lease its customer lists to third parties 
bni may from time to time contact you on behalf of external business
partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you 
in those cases 
your unique personally identifiable information e-mail name address telephone
number is not transferred to the third party 
in addition bni
may share data with trusted partners to help us perform statistical analysis send
you email or postal mail provide customer support or arrange for deliveries 
all
such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to
provide these services to bni and they are required to maintain
the confidentiality of your information 
bni does not use or disclose sensitive personal information such
as race religion or political affiliations without your explicit consent 
bni keeps track of the web sites and pages our customers visit within
bni in order to determine what bni services are
the most popular 
this data is used to deliver customized content and advertising
within bni to customers whose behavior indicates that they are interested
in a particular subject area 
bni web sites will disclose your personal information without notice 
only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is
necessary to a conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process
served on bni or the site bit protect and defend the rights or
property of bni and c act under exigent circumstances to protect
the personal safety of users of bni or the public 
use of cookies the bni web site use cookies to help you personalize your online
experience 
a cookie is a text file that is placed on your hard disk by a web page
server 
cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer 
cookies are uniquely assigned to you and can only be read by a web server in the
domain that issued the cookie to you 
one of the primary purposes of cookies is to provide a convenience feature to save
you time 
the purpose of a cookie is to tell the web server that you have returned
to a specific page 
for example if you personalize bni pages or
register with bni site or services a cookie helps bni
to recall your specific information on subsequent visits 
this simplifies the process
of recording your personal information such as billing addresses shipping addresses 
and so on 
when you return to the same bni web site the information
you previously provided can be retrieved so you can easily use the bni
features that you customized 
you have the ability to accept or decline cookies 
most web browsers automatically
accept cookies but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies
if you prefer 
if you choose to decline cookies you may not be able to fully experience
the interactive features of the bni services or web sites you visit 
security of your personal information bni secures your personal information from unauthorized access 
use or disclosure 
bni secures the personally identifiable information
you provide on computer servers in a controlled secure environment protected from
unauthorized access use or disclosure 
when personal information such as a credit
card number is transmitted to other web sites it is protected through the use
of encryption such as the secure socket layer ssl protocol 
changes to this statement bni will occasionally update this statement of privacy to reflect
company and customer feedback 
bni encourages you to periodically
review this statement to be informed of how bni is protecting your
information

if you believe that bni has not adhered to this statement please

we will use commercially reasonable efforts to promptly determine and remedy the
problem
